emailVerification.title: Verify email
emailVerification.description: You will receive a verification email in your inbox. Do check your spam folder if it doesn't arrive in your inbox.

tokenExpired.title: Token expired
tokenExpired.description: Your session token has expired or is no longer active. This happens when you have been idle too long.
tokenExpired.descriptionTwo: Please log in to submit a new request
